title.rendered: Western Stars – Songs From The Film

<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Western Stars - Songs From The Film | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/western-stars-songs-from-the-film/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Western Stars - Songs From The Film" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Columbia Records releases ‘Western Stars – Songs From The Film,’ the soundtrack album to Bruce Springsteen’s directorial debut. The album features each of the live performances captured in the film ‘Western Stars.’ Listeners will be able to hear the film versions of every song from Springsteen’s 2019 studio album, as well as a new cover of Glen Campbell’s “Rhinestone Cowboy.”In the film and on the album, Springsteen performs each of the fourteen songs with special guest Patti Scialfa, backed by a band and full orchestra. The soundtrack album was produced by Springsteen and Ron Aniello, mixed by Bob Clearmountain, and mastered by Bob Ludwig. The ‘Western Stars’ film was co-directed by Springsteen and Thom Zimny." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/western-stars-songs-from-the-film/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />

<meta property="article:modified_time" content="2023-05-04T16:03:23+00:00" />

<meta name="twitter:description" content="Columbia Records releases ‘Western Stars – Songs From The Film,’ the soundtrack album to Bruce Springsteen’s directorial debut. The album features each of the live performances captured in the film ‘Western Stars.’ Listeners will be able to hear the film versions of every song from Springsteen’s 2019 studio album, as well as a new cover of Glen Campbell’s “Rhinestone Cowboy.”In the film and on the album, Springsteen performs each of the fourteen songs with special guest Patti Scialfa, backed by a band and full orchestra. The soundtrack album was produced by Springsteen and Ron Aniello, mixed by Bob Clearmountain, and mastered by Bob Ludwig. The ‘Western Stars’ film was co-directed by Springsteen and Thom Zimny." />

yoast_head_json.title: Western Stars - Songs From The Film | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.og_title: Western Stars - Songs From The Film
yoast_head_json.og_description: Columbia Records releases ‘Western Stars – Songs From The Film,’ the soundtrack album to Bruce Springsteen’s directorial debut. The album features each of the live performances captured in the film ‘Western Stars.’ Listeners will be able to hear the film versions of every song from Springsteen’s 2019 studio album, as well as a new cover of Glen Campbell’s “Rhinestone Cowboy.”In the film and on the album, Springsteen performs each of the fourteen songs with special guest Patti Scialfa, backed by a band and full orchestra. The soundtrack album was produced by Springsteen and Ron Aniello, mixed by Bob Clearmountain, and mastered by Bob Ludwig. The ‘Western Stars’ film was co-directed by Springsteen and Thom Zimny.

The soundtrack album was produced by Springsteen and Ron Aniello, mixed by Bob Clearmountain, and mastered by Bob Ludwig. The ‘Western Stars’ film was co-directed by Springsteen and Thom Zimny.
